posts.post_content:
@DavidLopes  
  
Cabal Coffers is better because it doesn't require a way to put creatures in your graveyard. Coffers runs off of the lands you would be playing anyway, so you don't have to waste the extra cards. You can also use it in a reanimator deck without losing mana production like [Crypt of Agadeem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crypt of Agadeem) will. Oh, and [Bojuka Bog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bojuka Bog).
posts.html:
@DavidLopes

Cabal Coffers is better because it doesn't require a way to put creatures in your graveyard. Coffers runs off of the lands you would be playing anyway, so you don't have to waste the extra cards. You can also use it in a reanimator deck without losing mana production like Crypt of Agadeem will. Oh, and Bojuka Bog.
